Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    armourUp, avgHeals, greaterHeals, hypSuggestSkill, lesserHeals, Maps, maxHealthUp, riggedDice

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    The parent class for all items. The class provides Object Item attributes such as Item Name, Price, Stock, Duration and Description. Includes getter and setter methods for Attributes.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake Date: May 3rd 2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Item​(java.lang.String Name, int Price, int Stock)
      Constructor method for Item class Item Duration for all items are set to 1 by default as not all items has a effect that is applied over a time period.
